name: The Orbit: GP-One
description:
Welcome to the Gameplan VFX swing-by simulator.  Pilot the company vehicle and select a new site for the GPVFX HQ in this action/arcade extravaganza.  The best interstellar, micro-hatchback in its class:  The Orbit:  GP-One.

Version 1.01
- Can now skip intro and outro by clicking the LMB

- enabled fullscreen switch
